title: Monthly Climate Conditions - Interactive Map
content:
Generate maps showingÂ data for each of the 344 climate divisions in the U.S. Climate Divisional Database. You can specify monthly or yearly values, ranks, or anomalies for temperature, precipitation, heating and cooling degree days, and drought indices.
Measurements come from weather stations in the Global Historical Climatology Network-Daily (GHCN-D).
How do I use the site?
What can I do with these data?
Choose various ways to display the map by clicking buttons just above it. Click...
